original_title: Train commuter dies after colliding with signal post
original_body_lines: A 21-year-old youth who was traveling on the footboard of a moving train has been killed after colliding with a signal post near the railway line last morning (18).
The incident took place on an express train en route from Polgahawela to Colombo Fort, the police said.
The victim, a resident of Deniya Road in Ganemulla, succumbed to his injuries at the scene. The body has been placed in the mortuary of Ragama Hospital.
